item.title: Uganda's military chief denies army assaulted Bobi Wine's wife
item.description: Barbara Kyagulanyi, married to the opposition leader, says she refused to reveal her husband’s whereabouts.

item.title: Uganda's military chief denies army assaulted Bobi Wine's wife - BBC
item.description: Uganda’s military chief denies army assaulted Bobi Wine’s wife BBCUganda army chief denies allegation of assault on opposition leader’s wife ReutersAttorney fears for safety of Ugandan opposition figure Bobi Wine after army chief threats AP NewsUganda’s opposition leader is on the run The EconomistWife of Uganda’s opposition leader describes moment armed men attacked her at home fox5sandiego.com
